alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Mills (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 5:58PM CDT until September 09 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hamilton County in central Texas... Eastern Mills County in central Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 558 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northeast of Mullin, or 18 miles south of Comanche, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Goldthwaite, Center City, Star, Priddy, Pecan Wells, Indian Gap, Caradan, and Moline. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
